mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, password, name, birth, gender, email, tel, address, address_detail, postcode) values(#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{postcode})
mapper.update: update member set password=#{password}, name=#{name}, birth=#{birth}, gender=#{gender}, email=#{email}, tel=#{tel}, address=#{address}, address_detail=#{address_detail}, postcode=#{postcode} where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
mapper.delete: delete from member where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
mapper.select: select * from member order by reg_date desc
